name: Primus
description: Primus, also called Primus OG, is a complex indica strain that combines Arcata, Trainwreck, and 303 OG. Each parent strain passes on something special to Primus: Arcata with its creative activation, Trainwreck with its long-lasting euphoria, and 303 OG with its sour fruit flavors. This trifecta of duration, fragrance, and quality of high makes for a potent hybrid cherished by patients and recreational consumers alike. For those using cannabis medicinally, consider choosing Primus for evening management of depression, anxiety, appetite loss, or pain relief.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Creative, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid, Dizzy
